author: lvxing
content: hello, currently the blob gas fee in blob-utils is a fixed value, is there any RPC method that can return the current maxFeePerDataGas value?

author: __flcl
content: No such method yet, but you can relatively easily calculate it knowing previous block's values

author: tristan_wilson
content: Marius pointed me towards tx-fuzz, it has some examples https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/tx-fuzz/tree/4844
